NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 COLEUS: The Quantum Moon was orbiting Giant's Deep! Phlox wins the jellyfish game again! 2 1 PLUME: Yay! I won, I won! 3 1 PHLOX: What? I do not believe this.. Even with a set of eyes outside the planet, your guesses are too consistently precise, my son! 4 3 MELORAE: I am unsure what are the rules of this game, but it is quite entertaining! How does one play this jellyfish game? 5 3 COLEUS: The rules are simple, Melorae: whoever guesses the planet the Quantum Moon is currently orbiting, wins! 6 5 MELORAE: Oh, how delightful! Is this game named after how jellyfish are drawn to the ocean's surface by the Quantum Moon's gravity? If so, what a wonderful way to incorporate our research into this game! 7 5 MELORAE: But in that case, to have won so many games in succession.. Did you perhaps leave a set of eyes at the Quantum Moon Locator! Phlox? 8 7 PLUME: Ah, I should have known! Nobody could know where the Quantum Moon is so consistently without a set of eyes at the Quantum Moon Locator! 9 8 PHLOX: Haha, I knew papa would figure it out eventually! You're the smartest, papa! LCJ EX1 1 LCJ EX2 7 LCJ EX3 9
